column1: '''The Passing of the Elves''' is the tenth track of disc one of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - The Complete Recordings]]'' by [[Howard Shore]].
[00:50] I chîn a thûl lin míriel
[01:09] Ne ndor haer thar i aearon.
